page.title: 14THE MANOR HOUSE PROJECT
page.content: THERE IS A DETACHED,SEVEN BEDROOM, VICTORIAN RESIDENCE IN OLD HEXTHORPE SITUATED NEAR A LOCAL BEAUTY SPOT KNOWN AS 'THE DELL'.THIS HOUSE WAS FORMERLY OWNED BY MRS EVELYN WOODHOUSE WHO RECENTLY DIED A MILLIONAIRE SHORTLY BEFORE HER 100TH BIRTHDAY.SHE HAD WANTED HER HOME TO BE USED FOR SOME CARING/HEALING PURPOSE AND IT WAS DECIDED TO TRY TO RAISE THE MONEY TO CONVERT THE NOW DILAPIDATED HOUSE,WITH ITS ONE AND A HALF ACRES OF GROUNDS AND OUTBUILDINGS,INTO A CENTRE FOR CHRISTIAN CARE AND HEALING. IT IS HOPED THAT SOME PROVISION CAN BE MADE FOR THE DISABLED;THAT A SEMINAR ROOM COULD ULTIMATELY BE MADE AVAILABLE FOR THE USE OF LOCAL CHRISTIAN CHURCHES AND GROUPS,AND THAT THE CENTRE COULD BE USED FOR RELIGIOUS AND SECULAR MEETINGS.
